reviews.review: Отличная игра, прекрасный сюжет, ужасная графика
It's Half-Life! You don't like it? Get off this planet! Get off this Universe!
un clasico que no te puedes perder
Classic! Loved playing it again. Though a lot less scary as when I was 12
Да ви го начукам в гъза, защо не ми давате да натисна алт и f4, за да изляза възможно най-бързо от скапаната негърска игра, умри в адски мъки gaben
One of the most fun single player games I have ever played.

15грёбанных часов этой ебанной игры бляяяять я ебал проходил игру на сложном уровне сложно пиздец много было ошибок когда я застревал или забывал сохраняться и пришлось проходить всё заново хотя что я ожидал больше от игры которой уже 22 года сукаааааа верните моё ебанное время проведённое в этом гамне!!!А теперь серъёзно)))Я  люблю игры от Valve,но блять ребята бывает обидно когда ты нахуй стреляешь в упор,но не убиваешь,потому что ебанный движок 1998-года просто не засчитывает выстрелы.Хорошо игрушка мне понравилась хоть тут и нет капс-сцен т.e. это просто игра она не идёт как фильм(то что я люблю)минусов допиздище,НО ИГРА 1998-ГОДА И ЩАС VALVE УЖЕ ДЕЛАЕТ КРУЧЕ ВСЕ МИНУСЫ И БАГИ ИСПРАВЛЯЮТСЯ В НОВЫХ ИГРАХ(кроме кс го помойки ебанной(шучу))!!!Всё вообщем да я бы расставил все знаки препинания правильно и писал бы без ошибок,но я в тильте оттого что на последней миссии где босса надо проходить полчаса не больше я потратил 3 гребанных часа.Концовка отличная я получил хорошую плохая блть в халфе 2 автоматом выбирается хорошая естественно ладно всё игрушка норм тильт будет 100%,и вы захотите пройти эту помойку 1раз в своей жизни и никогда больше сюда не возвращаться!!!Коротко ахуенная хуйня я в ахуе ПИЗДЕЦ!!!

it's a must play
Ein wunderbares Spiel selbst noch in diesem Alter. Es lässt einen staunen, wie gut Valve die doch damals eingeschränkten technischen Möglichkeiten so gut genutzt hat.

Malísimo. Nunca lo jugué, lo hago en 2020 y sólo decir una cosa a su favor: posible envejecimiento "malo", aunque no es excusa. Mafia 1 se lanzó 4 años después y ES un juegazo. Pero bue; gustos de cada cual
The type of game you wanted to play over and over again. The experience this game offer is amazing and phenomenal
One of the best games ever made
Well it is a game from my childhood and I have loads of emotional memories about it, the story is interesting and exciting a 100%, for sure I would recommend it to anyone.
its half life its great, get half life 2 tho

Best FPS ever made, until Black Mesa that is. If you were unfortunate to never play Half-Life before start with this one and then onto Opposing-Force, Blue-Shift and then Black-Mesa just to appreciate what the Dev's  have produced. Excellent Game most worthy of your time !!!

If I'm being completely honest, this game still holds up after 14 years.  I've been playing for a while and I really like it.  Obviously since this game is so old it can't be a 10/10 but it's pretty close.  I did come across some glitches, but I just no clipped through them and i was right on my way.  The maneuvering controls can be finicky at times, but that is to be expected with a game as old as this.  So far, the story is pretty adequate and there are some pretty crazy turns in it.  I have not finished yet, but I'm excited to get back in and shoot some damn Headcrabs.
绝对推荐，但是建议玩 Black Mesa

Classic Valve title. This was my first time playing it all the way through and it was entertaining throughout. I enjoyed the puzzles and despite my dislike towards boss battles I had a fun time once I figured it out.  A must-play for anyone who owns Steam.

Playing this game for the first time in 2020, I'm amazed at how well the game runs and how engaging it is. The puzzles are challenging and it pulls you  directly into the game. The graphics are alright, and the people in the game are almost comical looking, but it's a solid game.
Un clásico para jugar con amigos.

This game is amazing. The graphics are surprisingly good for the time it came out. The game play is fun, though it can sometimes be delayed or just doesn't decide to work (mostly with the camera). Most segments that involve action are my highlight, going into a room and shooting up every enemy. 10/10 recommend.
old but gold, it'a classic, it's not aged well but it s a piece of gaming history
parece mas facil pero es un dolor de muela la verdad
还是小时候的感觉，就是玩的有点眩晕，恶心
eski olmasına ragmen efsanae bir oyun

I have been playing Half-Life since it came out.  I still believe it is one of the greatest games of all time.  The combat is top notch and the game puzzles are fun; mostly.  There are some puzzles that I despise, but most I enjoy (Lambda Core!!!).  Even though I've spent hundreds of hours playing HL, the replayability is there.  I never get tired of HL!
Half Life is a very good first person shooter!
Its half-life, what more do you want to know?

this game is definitely amazing when it came out and it still holds up as a good game to this day.

Хоть и вышла вчера новая игра этой серии, но исток этой игры, а именно Half-Life не перестает радовать и дарить впечатления того дня, когда я ее впервые запустил. Я, можно сказать, проникся атмосферой всеобщего хауса Черной Мезы, который вылился в огромную катастрофу и последующего геноцида людей. Если Вы не ознакомлены с продуктом, то рекомендую его купить и пройти,
Though old this game shows true
very intricate story line, and it is fun to explore the maps and weapons and its overall an amazing game

this game is so bad. it is cringe to make mods. the voice acting is below average, and the textures are abhorrent. the plot is confusing, most of the time you die it's due to bad game design. repetitive gameplay, and a lack of creativity. basic enemies and disappointing mechanics make this game an awful experience. not to mention there are no fart jokes . play minion rush for IOS or Android if you want a real gaming experience. Great Game. A Classic Even Today. The Only Problem Is There Isn't Uplink (1999 Demo) Or Decay (PS2) But It's A Great Game.

Its mad old, but still as much fun.

Finally made my way through, years late to the party of course. There's little to say that hasn't been said before. It's a classic for a reason. Once you experience it, you'll start seeing its influence EVERYWHERE. It holds up, too, except for some slippery movement making jump puzzles a chore. Story, gunplay, everything else? Spot on. You'll need to make every bullet count, though, this is one of those games that constantly keeps you on the edge of running out.
Great game the loading is short 10/10
